title: naTaraaja saraNam
sahitya:
naTarAjA sharaNam enadu gurunAthA un sharaNam



anupallavi



shuDarOngiya param jyOtip-poruLE shakti sundariyuDan unnai santatam cintittEn



caraNam



citta shuddhiyuDanE cirsabhaiyilE kUDi dhyAnattilE layitta

jnAnattuDanE pADi bhakti paravashattil

tad-dhimi enrADip-paramAnandam perum varamE nADinEn parindaruL

purindenuL nirantaram irundaruL
